document_data.title: To Walk the Cold Dark
document_data.story arc:
[[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]]
Terminal Ambitions Adventure: Shadow Games
document_data.mainbody:
'''''To Walk the Cold Dark''''', designed by [[Greg Marks]] and [[Jeremy Vosberg]], is an adventure in the [[Adventurers League/Dreams of the Red Wizards|Dreams of the Red Wizards]] storyline published for the [[Adventurers League]]. It is the fourth part of the Shadow Games series.

{{Quote|''In search of the Tenebrous Creed’s lair, you head to the Thunder Peaks—and the prison of an ancient evil bound there by the elves of Myth Drannor.''{{Cite adventurers league/To Walk the Cold Dark|1}}|}}
